entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to get CROSS APPLY? #30450
  • Automatically trim trailing spaces from query join clause with AsTracking #30449
  • Scaffold-DbContext fails: System.InvalidOperationException: The key {'DocumentTypeId'} cannot be added to keyless type 'DocumentType (Dictionary<string, object>)'. #30448
  • SqlQuery doesn't support scalar values but works with unmapped types #30447
  • t4 templates reuse in different projects #30446
  • Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 6.0.8 was not found. An approximate best match of Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 7.0.1 was resolved. #30444
  • Allow migration script with Connection String #30443

Closed

  • Remove unneeded parentheses in SQL queries #26767
    8.0.0
  • GroupBy list of ranges #30425
  • Using transaction with EF core 6 with SQL Server Temporal tables leads to generation of rows with identical values for Start/End datetimes on period columns that cannot be retrieved with temporal query #30416
  • "System.ArgumentException : An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Param_0" - when I try to run query second and subsequent times #30396

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30273 - EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30451
  • Don't log both `SaveChangesFailed` and `OptimisticConcurrencyException` for same event #30445
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #30442
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Full management of SQL operator precedence/associativity #30371
